name: Road Race 3D
description:
Do you have what it takes to race through traffic and beat the competition?

Run against others to avoid cars, overcome obstacles, and cross the road to the finish!

How to Play:

- Tap and hold to run
- Release to stop
- Avoid crashing into cars, trains, water, and obstacles
- Race against the crowd to be the first one to the finish line
- Collect coins and unlock cool outfits
